DruidSpells.Name: Animal Friendship
DruidSpells.Description: This spell lets you convince a beast that you mean it no harm.

DruidSpells.Name: Charm Person
DruidSpells.Description: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Create or Destroy Water
DruidSpells.Description: You either create or destroy water.

DruidSpells.Name: Cure Wounds
DruidSpells.Description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

DruidSpells.Name: Detect Magic
DruidSpells.Description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you.

DruidSpells.Name: Detect Poison and Disease
DruidSpells.Description: For the duration, you can sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases.

DruidSpells.Name: Entangle
DruidSpells.Description: Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square.

DruidSpells.Name: Faerie Fire
DruidSpells.Description: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light.

DruidSpells.Name: Fog Cloud
DruidSpells.Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered on a point within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Goodberry
DruidSpells.Description: Up to ten berries appear in your hand and are infused with magic for the duration.

DruidSpells.Name: Healing Word
DruidSpells.Description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

DruidSpells.Name: Jump
DruidSpells.Description: You touch a creature. The creature's jump distance is tripled until the spell ends.

DruidSpells.Name: Longstrider
DruidSpells.Description: You touch a creature. The target's speed increases by 10 feet until the spell ends.

DruidSpells.Name: Purify Food and Drink
DruidSpells.Description: All nonmagical food and drink within a 5-foot radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range is purified and rendered free of poison and disease.

DruidSpells.Name: Speak with Animals
DruidSpells.Description: You gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts for the duration.

DruidSpells.Name: Thunderwave
DruidSpells.Description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw.

DruidSpells.Name: Animal Messenger
DruidSpells.Description: By means of this spell, you use an animal to deliver a message.

DruidSpells.Name: Barkskin
DruidSpells.Description: You touch a willing creature. Until the spell ends, the target's skin has a rough, bark-like appearance.

DruidSpells.Name: Darkvision
DruidSpells.Description: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in the dark.

DruidSpells.Name: Enhance Ability
DruidSpells.Description: You touch a creature and bestow upon it a magical enhancement.

DruidSpells.Name: Find Traps
DruidSpells.Description: You sense the presence of any trap within range that is within line of sight.

DruidSpells.Name: Flame Blade
DruidSpells.Description: You evoke a fiery blade in your free hand.

DruidSpells.Name: Flaming Sphere
DruidSpells.Description: A 5-foot-diameter sphere of fire appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within range and lasts for the duration.

DruidSpells.Name: Gust of Wind
DruidSpells.Description: A line of strong wind 60 feet long and 10 feet wide blasts from you in a direction you choose for the spell's duration.

DruidSpells.Name: Heat Metal
DruidSpells.Description: Choose a manufactured metal object, such as a metal weapon or a suit of heavy or medium metal armor.

DruidSpells.Name: Hold Person
DruidSpells.Description: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration.

DruidSpells.Name: Lesser Restoration
DruidSpells.Description: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it.

DruidSpells.Name: Locate Animals or Plants
DruidSpells.Description: Describe or name a specific kind of beast or plant. Concentrating on the voice of nature in your surroundings, you learn the direction and distance to the closest creature or plant of that kind.

DruidSpells.Name: Locate Object
DruidSpells.Description: Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location, as long as that object is within 1,000 feet of you.

DruidSpells.Name: Moonbeam
DruidSpells.Description: A silvery beam of pale light shines down in a 5-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Pass without Trace
DruidSpells.Description: A veil of shadows and silence radiates from you, masking you and your companions from detection.

DruidSpells.Name: Protection from Poison
DruidSpells.Description: You touch a creature. If it is poisoned, you neutralize the poison.

DruidSpells.Name: Spike Growth
DruidSpells.Description: The ground in a 20-foot radius centered on a point within range twists and sprouts hard spikes and thorns.

DruidSpells.Name: Call Lightning
DruidSpells.Description: A storm cloud appears in the shape of a cylinder that is 10 feet tall with a 60-foot radius, centered on a point you can see 100 feet directly above you.

DruidSpells.Name: Conjure Animals
DruidSpells.Description: You summon fey spirits that take the form of beasts and appear in unoccupied spaces that you can see within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Daylight
DruidSpells.Description: A 60-foot-radius sphere of light spreads out from a point you choose within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Dispel Magic
DruidSpells.Description: Choose any creature, object, or magical effect within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Meld into Stone
DruidSpells.Description: You step into a stone object or surface large enough to fully contain your body, melding yourself and all the equipment you carry with the stone for the duration.

DruidSpells.Name: Plant Growth
DruidSpells.Description: This spell channels vitality into plants within a specific area.

DruidSpells.Name: Protection from Energy
DruidSpells.Description: For the duration, the willing creature you touch has resistance to one damage type of your choice.

DruidSpells.Name: Sleet Storm
DruidSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, freezing rain and sleet fall in a 20-foot-tall cylinder with a 40-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Speak with Plants
DruidSpells.Description: You imbue plants within 30 feet of you with limited sentience and animation.

DruidSpells.Name: Water Breathing
DruidSpells.Description: This spell gives a maximum of ten willing creatures you can see within range the ability to breathe underwater.

DruidSpells.Name: Water Walk
DruidSpells.Description: This spell grants the ability to move across any liquid surface, such as water, acid, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava, as if it were harmless solid ground.

DruidSpells.Name: Wind Wall
DruidSpells.Description: A wall of strong wind rises from the ground at a point you choose within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Blight
DruidSpells.Description: Necromantic energy washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range, draining moisture and vitality from it.

DruidSpells.Name: Confusion
DruidSpells.Description: This spell assaults and twists creatures' minds, spawning delusions and provoking uncontrolled actions.

DruidSpells.Name: Conjure Minor Elementals
DruidSpells.Description: You summon elementals that appear in unoccupied spaces that you can see within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Conjure Woodland Beings
DruidSpells.Description: You summon fey creatures that appear in unoccupied spaces that you can see within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Control Water
DruidSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, you control any freestanding water inside an area you choose that is a cube up to 100 feet on a side.

DruidSpells.Name: Dominate Beast
DruidSpells.Description: You attempt to beguile a beast that you can see within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Freedom of Movement
DruidSpells.Description: For the duration, the target's movement is unaffected by difficult terrain, and spells and other magical effects can neither reduce the target's speed nor cause the target to be paralyzed or restrained.

DruidSpells.Name: Giant Insect
DruidSpells.Description: You transform up to ten centipedes, three spiders, five wasps, or one scorpion within range into giant versions of their natural forms.

DruidSpells.Name: Hallucinatory Terrain
DruidSpells.Description: You make natural terrain in a 150-foot cube in range look, sound, and even smell like some other sort of natural terrain.

DruidSpells.Name: Ice Storm
DruidSpells.Description: A hail of rock-hard ice pounds to the ground in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Locate Creature
DruidSpells.Description: Describe or name a creature that is familiar to you.

DruidSpells.Name: Polymorph
DruidSpells.Description: This spell transforms a creature that you can see within range into a new form.

DruidSpells.Name: Stone Shape
DruidSpells.Description: You touch a stone object of Medium size or smaller or a section of stone no more than 5 feet in any dimension and form it into any shape that suits your purpose.

DruidSpells.Name: Stoneskin
DruidSpells.Description: This spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone.

DruidSpells.Name: Wall of Fire
DruidSpells.Description: You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Antilife Shell
DruidSpells.Description: A shimmering barrier extends out from you in a 10-foot radius and moves with you, remaining centered on you and hedging out creatures other than undead and constructs.

DruidSpells.Name: Awaken
DruidSpells.Description: After spending the casting time tracing magical pathways within a precious gemstone, you touch a huge or smaller beast or plant.

DruidSpells.Name: Commune with Nature
DruidSpells.Description: You briefly become one with nature and gain knowledge of the surrounding territory.

DruidSpells.Name: Conjure Elemental
DruidSpells.Description: You call forth an elemental servant.

DruidSpells.Name: Contagion
DruidSpells.Description: Your touch inflicts disease.

DruidSpells.Name: Geas
DruidSpells.Description: You place a magical command on a creature that you can see within range, forcing it to carry out some service or refrain from some action or course of activity as you decide.

DruidSpells.Name: Greater Restoration
DruidSpells.Description: You imbue a creature you touch with positive energy to undo a debilitating effect.

DruidSpells.Name: Insect Plague
DruidSpells.Description: Swarming, biting locusts fill a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Mass Cure Wounds
DruidSpells.Description: A wave of healing energy washes out from a point of your choice within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Planar Binding
DruidSpells.Description: With this spell, you attempt to bind a celestial, an elemental, a fey, or a fiend to your service.

DruidSpells.Name: Reincarnate
DruidSpells.Description: You touch a dead humanoid or a piece of a dead humanoid.

DruidSpells.Name: Scrying
DruidSpells.Description: You can see and hear a particular creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence as you.

DruidSpells.Name: Tree Stride
DruidSpells.Description: You gain the ability to enter a tree and move from inside it to inside another tree of the same kind within 500 feet.

DruidSpells.Name: Wall of Stone
DruidSpells.Description: A nonmagical wall of solid stone springs into existence at a point you choose within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Conjure Fey
DruidSpells.Description: You summon a fey creature to an unoccupied space that you can see within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Find the Path
DruidSpells.Description: This spell allows you to find the shortest, most direct physical route to a specific fixed location that you are familiar with on the same plane of existence.

DruidSpells.Name: Heal
DruidSpells.Description: A surge of positive energy washes through the creature, causing it to regain 70 hit points.

DruidSpells.Name: Heroes' Feast
DruidSpells.Description: You bring forth a great feast, including magnificent food and drink.

DruidSpells.Name: Move Earth
DruidSpells.Description: Choose an area of terrain no larger than 40 feet on a side within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Sunbeam
DruidSpells.Description: A beam of brilliant light flashes out from your hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line.

DruidSpells.Name: Transport via Plants
DruidSpells.Description: This spell creates a magical link between a Large or larger inanimate plant within range and another plant, at any distance, on the same plane of existence.

DruidSpells.Name: Wall of Thorns
DruidSpells.Description: You create a wall of tough, pliable, tangled brush bristling with needle-sharp thorns.

DruidSpells.Name: Wind Walk
DruidSpells.Description: You and up to ten willing creatures you can see within range assume a gaseous form for the duration.

DruidSpells.Name: Fire Storm
DruidSpells.Description: A storm made up of sheets of roaring flame appears in a location you choose within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Mirage Arcane
DruidSpells.Description: You make terrain in an area up to 1 mile square look, sound, smell, and even feel like some other sort of terrain.

DruidSpells.Name: Plane Shift
DruidSpells.Description: You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence.

DruidSpells.Name: Regenerate
DruidSpells.Description: You touch a creature and stimulate its natural healing ability.

DruidSpells.Name: Reverse Gravity
DruidSpells.Description: This spell reverses gravity in a 50-foot-radius, 100-foot high cylinder centered on a point within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Animal Shapes
DruidSpells.Description: You transform up to ten willing creatures you can see within range into forms of your choice.

DruidSpells.Name: Antipathy/Sympathy
DruidSpells.Description: This spell attracts or repels creatures of your choice.

DruidSpells.Name: Control Weather
DruidSpells.Description: You take control of the weather within five miles of you for the duration.

DruidSpells.Name: Earthquake
DruidSpells.Description: You create a seismic disturbance at a point on the ground that you can see within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Feeblemind
DruidSpells.Description: You blast the mind of a creature that you can see within range, attempting to shatter its intellect and personality.

DruidSpells.Name: Sunburst
DruidSpells.Description: Brilliant sunlight flashes in a 60-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range.

DruidSpells.Name: Foresight
DruidSpells.Description: You touch a willing creature and bestow a limited ability to see into the immediate future.

DruidSpells.Name: Shapechange
DruidSpells.Description: You assume the form of a different creature for the duration.

DruidSpells.Name: Storm of Vengeance
DruidSpells.Description: A churning storm cloud forms, centered on a point you can see and spreading to a radius of 360 feet.

DruidSpells.Name: True Resurrection
DruidSpells.Description: You touch a creature that has been dead for no longer than 200 years and that died for any reason except old age.
